droid4me API documentation

droid4me is an Android framework library which makes the development of Android application faster and more robust.

See:
          Description

Core features
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.appwidget Handles Android desktop widgets.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.content This package is a counterpart of the android.content Android package.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.log Wraps and frameworks the Android menu feature.

 

Shared in the framework
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo The definition of business objects used inside the framework.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework Defines some common types used throughout the library.

 

Caching and persistence
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ws A framework for the Web Services (WS).
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.wscache Joins together the caching feature and the Web Services.

 

Bitmap downloader
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap.

 

User Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.graphics.drawable This package is a counterpart of the android.graphics.drawable Android package.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.menu Everything related to the static and contextual menus.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ui Some User Interface (UI) widgets.
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.widget Gathers graphical and widget designs.

 

Utilities
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.util Some helper classes.

 

Other Packages
com.smartnsoft.droid4me  
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.app  
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.menu  

 

droid4me is an Android framework library which makes the development of Android application faster and more robust.

The library is composed by a framework for the activities, and of several packages dedicated to Android, such as a cache, an image downloader, the handling of menu and contextual menus...
